sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.getGroupsAssociatedWithQueues</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>getGroupsAssociatedWithQueues</name>
        <script><![CDATA[function getGroupsAssociatedWithQueues() {
    var groupSysIds = [];
    var gr = new GlideRecord('awa_group_queue_priority');
    gr.query();

    if (gr.getRowCount() == 0) {
        return groupSysIds;
    }

    while (gr.next()) {
        if (groupSysIds.indexOf(gr.group.toString()) === -1) {
            groupSysIds.push(gr.group.toString());
        }
    }
    return groupSysIds;
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-08-30 11:51:54</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>358f1b4e0f2f3300fe85fb8585767e2b</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>getGroupsAssociatedWithQueues</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Advanced Work Assignment" source="com.glide.awa">28463c602fa33010d8a4d5f62799b6ab</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_358f1b4e0f2f3300fe85fb8585767e2b</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-08-30 11:51:54</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>391</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
